alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pasco, southwestern Hernando and north central Hillsborough Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Land O Lakes to Temple Terrace. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Temple Terrace, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Lutz, Brandon, St. Leo, Hillsborough River State Park, Zephyrhills South, East Lake-Orient Park, Zephyrhills West, Land O Lakes, Greater Carrollwood, Hernando County Airport, University, Wesley Chapel South, Keystone, Greater Northdale and Pebble Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco
